The neighborhood hosts a weekly farmer's market on Tuesdays. NOBE is fast becoming one of the East Bay's most talked-about neighborhoods, offering a mix of single-family homes and modern condos. With convenient access to Oakland, Berkeley, Emeryville, and San Francisco, many Bay Area residents are finding out what makes this neighborhood so popular. The multiple farmers markets, shops, BART, bike trails, and more will keep you busy on sun-filled afternoons. Points of interest include the newly constructed Berkeley Bowl West, Doyle Hollis Park, Emeryville's Bay Street, restaurants, yoga studios, and the free EmeryGoRound shuttle. * 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom* Open floor plan* Large kitchen with new cabinets, new counters, and new refrigerator and gas oven/range* Spacious bedroom with large closet* Newly remodeled bathroom with shower over tub* Hardwood flooring in living areas and bedroom* Garage parking available for an additional $150 a month* Laundromat nearby* Conveniently located to freeways and BART* Pets considered on an individual basis… More Less

listings.Title: $8,695/mo
listings.Description:
There is no other unit like this one in Oakland. This is an incredible opportunity to rent a HUGE, ONE OF A KIND 4 Bed/2.5 Bath unit, directly on Lake Merritt with beautiful views.
The elevator opens directly into the massive 2,850 square foot apartment and is appointed with brand new, high end, modern amenities and conveniences. The open floor plan includes a living room with wood burning fireplace, a large dining area with beautiful light fixtures and a massive kitchen. The chef's kitchen is flawlessly designed with honed granite, soft close cabinets, a Thermador gas range, Viking refrigerator, Viking hood, oven, microwave, dishwasher and garbage disposal. A kitchen peninsula perfect for stools, combined with the wet bar, wine fridge, access to a half bath and endless open space make this an entertainers dream. Gleaming wood floors throughout the dining room, living room and kitchen as well as recessed lighting with dimmers and soundproofing help to tie this modern nest above Lake Merritt together.
A solarium that wraps around the dining and living room provides exceptional views of Lake Merritt, downtown Oakland and is perfect for a bright office or sunny place to hang out with friends and people watch.
Down the hall, you will be led into the master bedroom with freshly laid, new carpet, his and hers closets, a seperate vanity area with an additional walk-in closet and a full en suite bathroom with a glass enclosed shower, stone counters, and Toto toilet.
Further into this massive floor plan you will find a large linen closet and bathroom that services the three other bedrooms and comes complete with dual sinks, a tub/shower combo and Toto toilet. Bedrooms have massive closets, new carpet and endless storage. One bedroom can be used as on office and has convenient built in furniture.
Walking distance to top rated restaurants, health and fitness classes, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, BART and steps to famous Lake Merritt make this an incredible location to live. Easy access to major freeways as well!
A secure attached garage parking spot and another outdoor spot are available for $250/month extra.
Additional amenities include, in unit washer & dryer hook ups, keyless secure entry into building, gated building, dual pane windows and an additional storage closet in the garage.

listings.Title: $2,350/mo
listings.Description: Large and Sunny Apartment in NOBE This great 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment has been tastefully remodeled. Located in a charming 6-unit building built in 1915, this home enjoys a large well-lit open living space and features high ceilings, wood floors, and a newly remodeled kitchen and bathroom. 1804 62nd Street is centrally located in NOBE, the heart of the North Oakland/Berkeley/Emeryville border, with easy access to freeways and public transit. The building is close to Ashby BART station, the post office, laundromat, Berkeley Bowl, and many restaurants such as Sweet Adeline Bakery, Lois the Pie Queen, Hoi Polloi Brewpub, and Rasa Cafe. The neighborhood hosts a weekly farmer's market on Tuesdays. NOBE is fast becoming one of the East Bay's most talked-about neighborhoods, offering a mix of single-family homes and modern condos. With convenient access to Oakland, Berkeley, Emeryville, and San Francisco, many Bay Area residents are finding out what makes this neighborhood so popular. The multiple farmers markets, shops, BART, bike trails, and more will keep you busy on sun-filled afternoons. Points of interest include the newly constructed Berkeley Bowl West, Doyle Hollis Park, Emeryville's Bay Street, restaurants, yoga studios, and the free EmeryGoRound shuttle. * 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom* Open floor plan* Large kitchen with new cabinets, new counters, and new refrigerator and gas oven/range* Spacious bedroom with large closet* Newly remodeled bathroom with shower over tub* Hardwood flooring in living areas and bedroom* Garage parking available for an additional $150 a month* Laundromat nearby* Conveniently located to freeways and BART* Pets considered on an individual basis… More Less

House for rent in the luxurious Skyline Hills of Oakland, CA. This house features 3 bedrooms, 2 newly remodeled baths, newly remodeled kitchen with deck access, massive living room with fireplace, formal dining room, garage parking, huge master bedroom with separate full bath and over 2,000 sq ft of tranquility.
Amenities include 2 beautifully remodeled baths with porcelain tile and brush nickel hardware, newly remodeled kitchen with deck access, quartz counter tops, large stainless steel sink and faucet, electric stove cook top, stainless steel refrigerator and dishwasher, cozy fireplace, stack-able washer and dryer hookups and porcelain hardwood tile floors throughout.
One minute up the hill lies expansive Chabot Regional Park with a myriad of hiking, biking trails and even an equestrian stable. At the bottom of the hill are Bishop O'Dowd High School, Mills College and Merritt College with easy access to Warren Freeway and 580.
Please no pets and no smoking.

listings.Title: $8,695/mo
listings.Description:
There is no other unit like this one in Oakland. This is an incredible opportunity to rent a HUGE, ONE OF A KIND 4 Bed/2.5 Bath unit, directly on Lake Merritt with beautiful views.
The elevator opens directly into the massive 2,850 square foot apartment and is appointed with brand new, high end, modern amenities and conveniences. The open floor plan includes a living room with wood burning fireplace, a large dining area with beautiful light fixtures and a massive kitchen. The chef's kitchen is flawlessly designed with honed granite, soft close cabinets, a Thermador gas range, Viking refrigerator, Viking hood, oven, microwave, dishwasher and garbage disposal. A kitchen peninsula perfect for stools, combined with the wet bar, wine fridge, access to a half bath and endless open space make this an entertainers dream. Gleaming wood floors throughout the dining room, living room and kitchen as well as recessed lighting with dimmers and soundproofing help to tie this modern nest above Lake Merritt together.
A solarium that wraps around the dining and living room provides exceptional views of Lake Merritt, downtown Oakland and is perfect for a bright office or sunny place to hang out with friends and people watch.
Down the hall, you will be led into the master bedroom with freshly laid, new carpet, his and hers closets, a seperate vanity area with an additional walk-in closet and a full en suite bathroom with a glass enclosed shower, stone counters, and Toto toilet.
Further into this massive floor plan you will find a large linen closet and bathroom that services the three other bedrooms and comes complete with dual sinks, a tub/shower combo and Toto toilet. Bedrooms have massive closets, new carpet and endless storage. One bedroom can be used as on office and has convenient built in furniture.
Walking distance to top rated restaurants, health and fitness classes, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, BART and steps to famous Lake Merritt make this an incredible location to live. Easy access to major freeways as well!
A secure attached garage parking spot and another outdoor spot are available for $250/month extra.
Additional amenities include, in unit washer & dryer hook ups, keyless secure entry into building, gated building, dual pane windows and an additional storage closet in the garage.
*No Pets Please.
*No Water Beds Please
*No Smokers Please.
For additional information and to schedule a viewing please contact us via phone or email. Emails without a contact phone number will be discarded. Showings by Appointment Only.
We do not discriminate on the basis of sex, race, color, gender, religion, family status, marital status, national origin, ancestry, handicaps, age, political affiliation, etc.
Thanks very much for your interest!

listings.Description:
Mid-Century 3 Bedroom Montclair Home Now Available! - Nestled in the Montclair district of Oakland, perched above the fog is a charming 3 bedroom 2 bathroom mid-century ranch style home on Heartwood Drive. This warm and bright home combines the classic beauty of the past with pleasant memories of today. Your guests will enter through the charming courtyard entrance into the foyer that directs you towards different parts of the home. The open floor plan of the large living room, dining area, and kitchen offers hardwood floors throughout, a working fireplace, and direct access to the large level out deck for al fresco dining and relaxation. A separate entrance from the 2 car garage offers direct access to the hallway and sleeping quarters. Three bedrooms and two bathrooms are available within close proximity to each other. Down an interior flight of stairs is a large finished family room and additional storage area ideal for a wine cellar.
Located near the Montclair Village, Redwood Regional Park & Trails, Chabot Space and Science Center.
This home is approximately 1900 square feet and features:
*Corner Lot

*Central Heating and Air Conditioning

listings.Description:
There is no other unit like this one in Oakland. This is an incredible opportunity to rent a HUGE, ONE OF A KIND 4 Bed/2.5 Bath unit, directly on Lake Merritt with beautiful views.
The elevator opens directly into the massive 2,850 square foot apartment and is appointed with brand new, high end, modern amenities and conveniences. The open floor plan includes a living room with wood burning fireplace, a large dining area with beautiful light fixtures and a massive kitchen. The chef's kitchen is flawlessly designed with honed granite, soft close cabinets, a Thermador gas range, Viking refrigerator, Viking hood, oven, microwave, dishwasher and garbage disposal. A kitchen peninsula perfect for stools, combined with the wet bar, wine fridge, access to a half bath and endless open space make this an entertainers dream. Gleaming wood floors throughout the dining room, living room and kitchen as well as recessed lighting with dimmers and soundproofing help to tie this modern nest above Lake Merritt together.
A solarium that wraps around the dining and living room provides exceptional views of Lake Merritt, downtown Oakland and is perfect for a bright office or sunny place to hang out with friends and people watch.
Down the hall, you will be led into the master bedroom with freshly laid, new carpet, his and hers closets, a seperate vanity area with an additional walk-in closet and a full en suite bathroom with a glass enclosed shower, stone counters, and Toto toilet.
Further into this massive floor plan you will find a large linen closet and bathroom that services the three other bedrooms and comes complete with dual sinks, a tub/shower combo and Toto toilet. Bedrooms have massive closets, new carpet and endless storage. One bedroom can be used as on office and has convenient built in furniture.
Walking distance to top rated restaurants, health and fitness classes, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, BART and steps to famous Lake Merritt make this an incredible location to live. Easy access to major freeways as well!
A secure attached garage parking spot and another outdoor spot are available for $250/month extra.
Additional amenities include, in unit washer & dryer hook ups, keyless secure entry into building, gated building, dual pane windows and an additional storage closet in the garage.

TAKING APPLICATIONS NOW
APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):
1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.
http
eliteapts.com/available-properties/
2) All supporting documents such as pay-stubs, IDs, current and past rental history with phone numbers must be attached to the online application please.
3) All the documents must be submitted before we process an application.
4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We don't want your application fees and we encourage people not to randomly apply and pay an application fee that they cannot recover.
5) We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosures. Every once in a while an error may creep into one of our advertisements even after we proof and re-proof an ad. We in no way intend to make any misrepresentations and attempt to correct any errors as soon as we are notified. Also, we often must rely on the words of a property owner for various items listed in our posts. BEMG won't accept any responsibility if any such errors appear into our advertisements.
All square footage is approximate. At times pictures may be of a similar unit and not necessarily of the unit being advertised.
When in doubt, please ask questions until you are fully satisfied.
6) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. We are an equal opportunity housing provider.
7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease.
8) We structure the lease so that the lease end date is no later than the end of the Summer and they'd be Renewable again for a Year at the termination.
9) We require the residents to purchase a Tenant Liability Insurance policy offered through us at $9.50 per month or this policy can be purchased by the tenant on her own.
Thank you for your attention to all of the above.
BEMG Staff

listings.Title: $4,250/mo
listings.Description:
Living Large in the Pocket Lofts - This is an extremely well-appointed loft in an award-winning building in Oaklands Jack London Square.
Dont let the Pocket Lofts name fool you; Unit 2C spans 1600 square feet and features soaring 13 ceilings. Floor to ceiling windows let in the light and views of the Town, while custom fitted blackout curtains and Hunter Douglas blinds provide multiple degrees of privacy and light control. The west-facing patio sees great late-afternoon sun. Walls of bookcases and built-ins throughout enhance the loft's open feel.
The gourmet kitchen features a Viking built-in fridge & 36 6-burner stove, Bosch dishwasher, concealed stacked Bosch laundry, 30-bottle wine fridge, trash compactor, pantry, stainless steel counters, and an "eat-on" kitchen island with moveable woodblock attachment that lends itself to natural, flexible entertaining.
The loft bedroom, a natural vantage point from which to survey the space, has a custom closet and chilewich floors, which contrast nicely with the newly-refinished hardwood floors in the living areas.

Cement and stone trim the sleek bathroom, which boasts a glass-enclosed shower over a jetted tub. Look closely to discover roll-out hampers, storage, and even a hideaway litter box tucked into the wall panels.
On a functional note, the high ceilings allow for two accessible and spacious storage areas -- one above the patio, and the other under the sleeping loft.
The best of Jack London Squares waterfront, dining and events are conveniently close, but just far enough away for comfort. Youll appreciate Blue Bottle Coffee and Bicycle Coffee being literally around the corner. Wineries, brewers and taprooms are all within blocks. Sunday Farmer's Market.
Transportation could not be more convenient -- within a few minutes, you can be on BART, Amtrak, 880/980 or a ferry. One secured off-street parking space is included in the lease.
No Dogs Allowed

Mid-Century Montclair 3 Bedroom with San Francisco Bay Views! - We are pleased to offer for lease a charming updated Mid-Century modern 3 bedroom and 2.5 bathroom home with an enclosed level yard in the desirable neighborhood of Montclair. This delightful property is situated on a cul-de-sac on a private road and offers its occupants an exceptional three bridge view and only minutes away from the Montclair Village, Piedmont Avenue, Glenview district, and College Avenue boutiques and eateries.
The open floor plan with beautiful hardwood floors maximizes the roomy feel of the living room, dining area and updated kitchen. The dining area and spacious living room with fireplace offers bay views; or step out to the front deck to enjoy the vista, fresh air and al fresco dining under the stars. The kitchen is equipped with cherry cabinets, stainless steel appliances, granite counters, a peninsula for counter eating and a view of the backyard to watch the kids play.
Each of the three bedrooms are well appointed and on the same floor and enjoys serene, tree-filled views. The master bedroom is equipped with a sizeable walk-in closet and updated bathroom with tiled shower and skylight. The main hallway bathroom sports a full bathtub, updated counter and is exceptionally roomy. Down a flight of stairs is the family or media room, laundry closet and a half bathroom. A large two car garage with additional storage and interior access is exceptionally convenient. A rare Montclair level yard is easily accessible and a great place to enjoy a barbeque with friends and family.
* Located on Friendly, Quiet Cul-de-Sac
*Hardwood Floors and Carpet
*Rare Flat lot with Large Grass Backyard and Play Structure
* Views of the Bay, SF, and the Golden Gate
* Easy Access to Freeways and Highways 13, 24, 580, 80 to San Francisco and the Greater Bay Area
*Short distance to Montclair Village, Lake Temescal, Glenview's Restaurant Row, and Rockridge BART
*Close to Montclair Elementary (rated 10/10), Montera Jr. High, Head Royce, Bentley, Corpus Christi School, and other Great Public and Private Schools

Tranquil Mid-Century Piedmont Pines/Montclair home with views of Downtown Oakland, San Francisco & the SF Bay. 3bed/2bath + attached bonus Au-pair/office space w/separate entrance & additional bath.
This fabulous home in the Oakland Hills features expansive SF Bay views from multiple rooms, gorgeous hardwood floors, and renovated kitchen & bathrooms. The setting is magical; a perfect retreat within minutes of the city lifestyle. Redwood Regional Park is walking distance from the home, and offers residents a chance to connect with nature daily. With convenient shopping in Montclair Village, close proximity to Highways 13, 24 & 580, and multiple transit options nearby, 25 Rydal Court is a rare find.
Property features:
- Living room features large picture window that overlooks Zen garden
- Expansive floorplan with great flow to the outdoors and central patio
- 3bedrooms and 2 baths on upper level
- Large bonus area on lower level; ideal for home office/entertaining/Au Pair space. This lower level has private entrance, high-grade carpet, full bath (tiled-shower) + built-in cupboards/shelving w/ sink/wet bar

- 2 spacious upper level guest bedrooms

- Tesla-ready 2-car garage!
- Property is located at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac & features long driveway that can easily accommodate additional guest parking
- Full sized side-by-side washer dryer in garage; washer/dryer hookups in lower level bath area.
- Large finished basement area; this flex-space is perfect for yoga/fitness, creative endeavors, or extra storage.
Neighborhood:
Piedmont Pines is located in the East Bay Hills, above Oakland's popular Montclair Village shopping district. Montclair Village features a wide array of shops & restaurants, a post office, public library, several banks, grocery stores and the poplar Montclair Sunday Farmer?s Market.
www.montclairvillage.com

- Highways 13, 24, and 580 are nearby

APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):
1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.

eliteapts.com/available-properties/

4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We don't want your application fees and we encourage people not to randomly apply and pay an application fee that they cannot recover.
5) We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosures. Every once in a while an error may creep into one of our advertisements even after we proof and re-proof an ad. We in no way intend to make any misrepresentations and attempt to correct any errors as soon as we are notified. Also, we often must rely on the words of a property owner for various items listed in our posts. BEMG won't accept any responsibility if any such errors appear into our advertisements.
All square footage is approximate. At times pictures may be of a similar unit and not necessarily of the unit being advertised.
When in doubt, please ask questions until you are fully satisfied.
6) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. We are an equal opportunity housing provider.
7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease.
8) We structure the lease so that the lease end date is no later than the end of the Summer and they'd be Renewable again for a Year at the termination.
9) We require the residents to purchase a Tenant Liability Insurance policy offered through us at $9.50 per month or this policy can be purchased by the tenant on her own.
Thank you for your attention to all of the above.

OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY 9:00am to NOON (or contact us for private showing)
About the home:
This lovely 2 bedroom, 1 bath flat includes several upgrades while maintaining the original charm of a 100-year-old Edwardian duplex. It features two large bedrooms, 3 closets (2 are walk-in), lots of windows and sunshine, hardwood floors (with area carpets to reduce noise), high ceilings and period woodwork. The kitchen has a gas stove/oven, microwave hood, dishwasher, refrigerator, garbage disposal, hanging pot rack and built-in shelves. You also have your own laundry room with full size washer/dryer, as well as a private deck over-looking the shared backyard with BBQ, picnic table and hammock.
About the Mosswood neighborhood:
With a Walk Score of 91, Transit Score of 72 and a Bike Score of 96, Mosswood is a small neighborhood in North Oakland perfectly situated for easy access to the best of Oakland and the Bay Area. The MacArthur BART station is a 6-minute walk away.
About your downstairs neighbors:
That's us, a husband and wife in our late 40s/early 50s who have owned the home for over 10 years. We're friendly, respectful and easy to get along with.
About you:
Since you'll be both our tenants AND upstairs neighbors, you're a good fit on both accounts. You're friendly, drama-free, have sufficient (and verifiable) income, good credit and are willing to help out with small tasks like either taking out or bringing in garbage cans, especially when we're out-of-town and keeping the exterior tidy. Being social is fine, a bunch of late night parties (especially on week nights) are not. Having friends visit is fine, having them essentially move in without our consent is not. Children are fine, pets and tobacco smoking are not. We look forward to meeting you!
Owner pays water and garbage.… More Less

LEASE TERMS


TAKING APPLICATIONS NOW
APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):
1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.
http
eliteapts.com/available-properties/
2) All supporting documents such as pay-stubs, IDs, current and past rental history with phone numbers must be attached to the online application please.
3) All the documents must be submitted before we process an application.
4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We don't want your application fees and we encourage people not to randomly apply and pay an application fee that they cannot recover.
5) We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosures. Every once in a while an error may creep into one of our advertisements even after we proof and re-proof an ad. We in no way intend to make any misrepresentations and attempt to correct any errors as soon as we are notified. Also, we often must rely on the words of a property owner for various items listed in our posts. BEMG won't accept any responsibility if any such errors appear into our advertisements.
All square footage is approximate. At times pictures may be of a similar unit and not necessarily of the unit being advertised.
When in doubt, please ask questions until you are fully satisfied.
6) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. We are an equal opportunity housing provider.
7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease.
8) We structure the lease so that the lease end date is no later than the end of the Summer and they'd be Renewable again for a Year at the termination.
9) We require the residents to purchase a Tenant Liability Insurance policy offered through us at $9.50 per month or this policy can be purchased by the tenant on her own.
Thank you for your attention to all of the above.
BEMG Staff

listings.Title: $4,250/mo
listings.Description:
Living Large in the Pocket Lofts - This is an extremely well-appointed loft in an award-winning building in Oaklands Jack London Square.
Dont let the Pocket Lofts name fool you; Unit 2C spans 1600 square feet and features soaring 13 ceilings. Floor to ceiling windows let in the light and views of the Town, while custom fitted blackout curtains and Hunter Douglas blinds provide multiple degrees of privacy and light control. The west-facing patio sees great late-afternoon sun. Walls of bookcases and built-ins throughout enhance the loft's open feel.
The gourmet kitchen features a Viking built-in fridge & 36 6-burner stove, Bosch dishwasher, concealed stacked Bosch laundry, 30-bottle wine fridge, trash compactor, pantry, stainless steel counters, and an "eat-on" kitchen island with moveable woodblock attachment that lends itself to natural, flexible entertaining.
The loft bedroom, a natural vantage point from which to survey the space, has a custom closet and chilewich floors, which contrast nicely with the newly-refinished hardwood floors in the living areas.

Cement and stone trim the sleek bathroom, which boasts a glass-enclosed shower over a jetted tub. Look closely to discover roll-out hampers, storage, and even a hideaway litter box tucked into the wall panels.
On a functional note, the high ceilings allow for two accessible and spacious storage areas -- one above the patio, and the other under the sleeping loft.
The best of Jack London Squares waterfront, dining and events are conveniently close, but just far enough away for comfort. Youll appreciate Blue Bottle Coffee and Bicycle Coffee being literally around the corner. Wineries, brewers and taprooms are all within blocks. Sunday Farmer's Market.
Transportation could not be more convenient -- within a few minutes, you can be on BART, Amtrak, 880/980 or a ferry. One secured off-street parking space is included in the lease.
No Dogs Allowed

Mid-Century Montclair 3 Bedroom with San Francisco Bay Views! - We are pleased to offer for lease a charming updated Mid-Century modern 3 bedroom and 2.5 bathroom home with an enclosed level yard in the desirable neighborhood of Montclair. This delightful property is situated on a cul-de-sac on a private road and offers its occupants an exceptional three bridge view and only minutes away from the Montclair Village, Piedmont Avenue, Glenview district, and College Avenue boutiques and eateries.
The open floor plan with beautiful hardwood floors maximizes the roomy feel of the living room, dining area and updated kitchen. The dining area and spacious living room with fireplace offers bay views; or step out to the front deck to enjoy the vista, fresh air and al fresco dining under the stars. The kitchen is equipped with cherry cabinets, stainless steel appliances, granite counters, a peninsula for counter eating and a view of the backyard to watch the kids play.
Each of the three bedrooms are well appointed and on the same floor and enjoys serene, tree-filled views. The master bedroom is equipped with a sizeable walk-in closet and updated bathroom with tiled shower and skylight. The main hallway bathroom sports a full bathtub, updated counter and is exceptionally roomy. Down a flight of stairs is the family or media room, laundry closet and a half bathroom. A large two car garage with additional storage and interior access is exceptionally convenient. A rare Montclair level yard is easily accessible and a great place to enjoy a barbeque with friends and family.

7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease.
8) We structure the lease so that the lease end date is no later than the end of the Summer and they'd be Renewable again for a Year at the termination.

OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY 9:00am to NOON (or contact us for private showing)
About the home:
This lovely 2 bedroom, 1 bath flat includes several upgrades while maintaining the original charm of a 100-year-old Edwardian duplex. It features two large bedrooms, 3 closets (2 are walk-in), lots of windows and sunshine, hardwood floors (with area carpets to reduce noise), high ceilings and period woodwork. The kitchen has a gas stove/oven, microwave hood, dishwasher, refrigerator, garbage disposal, hanging pot rack and built-in shelves. You also have your own laundry room with full size washer/dryer, as well as a private deck over-looking the shared backyard with BBQ, picnic table and hammock.
About the Mosswood neighborhood:
With a Walk Score of 91, Transit Score of 72 and a Bike Score of 96, Mosswood is a small neighborhood in North Oakland perfectly situated for easy access to the best of Oakland and the Bay Area. The MacArthur BART station is a 6-minute walk away.
About your downstairs neighbors:
That's us, a husband and wife in our late 40s/early 50s who have owned the home for over 10 years. We're friendly, respectful and easy to get along with.
About you:
Since you'll be both our tenants AND upstairs neighbors, you're a good fit on both accounts. You're friendly, drama-free, have sufficient (and verifiable) income, good credit and are willing to help out with small tasks like either taking out or bringing in garbage cans, especially when we're out-of-town and keeping the exterior tidy. Being social is fine, a bunch of late night parties (especially on week nights) are not. Having friends visit is fine, having them essentially move in without our consent is not. Children are fine, pets and tobacco smoking are not. We look forward to meeting you!
Owner pays water and garbage.… More Less

Live in a luxury loft style condominium located in the Waterfront district. This open floor plan offers one bedroom, one bathroom and comes fully furnished.
